title: Ep 65: Meghan Markle's Facialist Nichola Joss Talks Self-Tanning
itunes:title: Ep 65: Meghan Markle's Facialist Nichola Joss Talks Self-Tanning
itunes:subtitle: Grab your face oil, and break out the tanning mitt: Nichola Joss, celeb facialist and tanning expert shares all of her secrets for looking bronze and sculpted. Before that: We chat deodorant versus antiperspirant; Too Faced's rumored collaboration...
description:
Grab your face oil, and break out the tanning mitt: Nichola Joss, celeb facialist and tanning expert shares all of her secrets for looking bronze and sculpted. Before that: We chat deodorant versus antiperspirant; Too Faced's rumored collaboration; and Jess's nail salon nightmare.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
